snippet.title: Prison Architect | Escape Mode DLC | PS4
snippet.description: Prison Architect's Escape Mode is now available on PS4 as a hugely expanded DLC. Fight, sneak, and dig your way to freedom as you take control of an inmate with one goal: Escape. You've built the prisons, now it's your turn to break out. Play your own maps, and download prisons from across the globe with World Of Wardens.
